author: philngo
content: Is there any standard for when we deprecate endpoints? We're looking to scrap V1s of getBlock, produceBlock and publishBlock... though I'm unaware of any sort of coordination efforts or procedures for doing so. Is there any reason why we should not get rid of these after Deneb? Reference: https://github.com/ChainSafe/lodestar/issues/6085

author: .paulharris
content:
For Altair we had some endpoints that changed but the flow was basically that the old endpoints only needed to support phase0, and new endpoints would support both.
It's a fair question to be asking and probably worth having so that eveyrone's on the same page with whatever the decission ends up as...
I guess the v1 block production endpoints would be in that bucket of being required until deneb ships, and redundant after that... V3 should be supporting all the block types, but it just depends on when all clients have implemented it if we want to minimise interop issues.
